item.title: Chevereto Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to the ending of upstream support for the free version of Chevereto, we will shortly be deprecating our container. We recommend looking at alternative images such as pixapop, piwigo, or photoshow.
item.content:
Due to the ending of upstream support for the free version of Chevereto, we will shortly be deprecating our container.

We recommend looking at alternative images such as pixapop, piwigo, or photoshow.

item.title: New Container: Chevereto
item.description: We have released a new container for Chevereto! Chevereto is an image hosting software that allows you to create a beautiful and full-featured image hosting website on your own server. It’s your hosting and your rules, so say goodbye to closures and restrictions.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Chevereto!

Chevereto is an image hosting software that allows you to create a beautiful and full-featured image hosting website on your own server. It’s your hosting and your rules, so say goodbye to closures and restrictions.
